com.gwtplatform.dispatch.rest.client

Interface RestRequestBuilderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRestRequestBuilderFactory

    public interface RestRequestBuilderFactory
    Factory used to create RequestBuilder objects for a given RestAction.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <A extends RestAction<?>> 
      RequestBuilder      		 build(A action, String securityToken)
      Build a RequestBuilder object for the given action.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        <A extends RestAction<?>> RequestBuilder build(A action,
                                             String securityToken)
                     throws ActionException
        Build a RequestBuilder object for the given action.
        Type Parameters:
        A - the action type.
        Parameters:
        action - the RestAction for which to build the request.
        securityToken - the security token to add to the RequestBuilder. Usually the value bound to @XsrfHeaderName.
        Returns:
        a RequestBuilder object.
        Throws:
        ActionException - if an exception occured while creating the RequestBuilder.
